ratings.comment: There is nothing negative I can say about Professor Sone she is so incredibly amazing. She is a wonderful teacher who is so willing to meet you at your level and help you thrive. Yes, it is a hard class. Learning a language takes work- but she makes it the most rewarding work you will ever do.

Prof. Sone is caring and attentive. She meets you where you're at with Hebrew. Part of language learning is building community and immersion, and Sone really leans into this with participation-focused classes and lots of practice HW. She WILL push you to improve your skills, but she's always available for individualized help and is overall amazing.

Judith is the nicest professor! She is very helpful and responsive- she really wants you to do your best and will work with you if you are having trouble. As long as you do all of the homework and study, this class is an easy A and I definitely improved my Hebrew this semester!

Judith is the best professor. She knows the easiest ways to explain Hebrew concepts, and she will always work with you to make sure you understand. She keeps her class interesting and fun, and if you put in the effort she'll respect it. She cares about her students and she's just a really great person. Highly recommend!!

Judith is an amazing, intelligent, and caring professor! She makes her classes enjoyable and fun. She is very laid back and is always available to talk and she wants to ensure that every student succeeds. I recommend her to anyone! She rocks!
Judith is one of my favorite professors. She is kind and understanding. Her Hebrew classes are tough but she meets you where you are.

Judith is literally the nicest person in the world. I would take her class every semester for the rest of my time at UW if I could. Everything is graded very fair and there is not an extensive amount of work. She expects you to put effort in and if you show that you care, she'll respect you and give you good grades.

Judith is without a doubt one of the most dedicated profs at UW. She genuinely cares about how her students do and she is extremely effective in creating a fun, accepting and encouraging learning environment. While the class is a bit fast-paced, I cannot recommend Judith enough  she is a phenomenal professor and person!

I LOVE Judith! She is also the Jewish Studies chair, and she is amazing at both positions. She is so caring for all of her students and is willing to accommodate each individual's needs. She went at a great pace for a class featuring a mix of students with some to no experience. I cannot recommend Judith enough, she deserves the world.
